com.thoughtworks.robot.moves
Class BaseMoveFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.thoughtworks.robot.moves.BaseMoveFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
MoveFactory
public class BaseMoveFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoveFactory

A factory class for supported Move on a Plateau for a Robot. If there is need to support new type of Move then, we can add it to movesFactory using getter/setter.

Author:
sshinde
See Also:
Move, LeftMove, RightMove, StepMove, MoveFactory
